# orion-nav-button

The orion-nav-button is a navigation button that you can use in the `orion-header` component. Labels display below the icon in desktop viewports, and default to displaying to the right of the icon in mobile. Label can be displayed to the left of the icon in mobile by using the `label-position` prop. 

Additional documentation available at [orion.united.com](https://orion.united.com/)

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                    | Type                | Default   |
| --------------- | ---------------- | ------------------------------ | ------------------- | --------- |
| `iconName`      | `icon-name`      | The icon name                  | `string`            | `''`      |
| `isActive`      | `is-active`      | The active state of the button | `boolean`           | `false`   |
| `labelPosition` | `label-position` | The position of the label      | `"left" \| "right"` | `'right'` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                   | Description                    |
| -------------------------------------- | ------------------------------ |
| `--orion-nav-button__background-color` | Background color of nav button |
| `--orion-nav-button__color`            | Color of nav button            |
